page.title: 18Plant Nurseries
page.content: COURT LANE NURSERY Mr.Kerr told us about Court Lane Nursery.They grow apples,tomatoes and cucumbers.They also grow flowers especially roses which they sell on the site.There are very large glass houses where they grow the flowers. At the back of the nursery are some stables where they keep a few horses. EUROPA NURSERY Europa Nurseries sell pot plants. They have about half a million plants in stock every year.They import 50% of their plants from Holland,Germany and Denmark.The rest come from the U.K. They supply Garden Centres and Marks and Spencer with their plants. The company is owned by A.Evans and used to be in London.It was opened in 1966.
